title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure and components of PlataformaInteligenciaColectiva, focusing on scalability and collective intelligence.

title: Implement Frontend Design
description: Create user interfaces for PlataformaInteligenciaColectiva that are intuitive and easy to navigate.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Create the backend services required to implement the core functionality of PlataformaInteligenciaColectiva.

title: Design Decision Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms to facilitate collective decision-making based on consensus and intelligence.

title: Develop Database Schema
description: Design and implement the database schema necessary for PlataformaInteligenciaColectiva.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the platform is secure and protects user data.

title: Create Comprehensive User Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for users to guide them in utilizing PlataformaInteligenciaColectiva. The documentation should cover user registration, platform navigation, feature usage, and troubleshooting steps, with a focus on ensuring that the content is easy to understand and accessible for users of all skill levels.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Test the functionality and performance of PlataformaInteligenciaColectiva to ensure it meets requirements.

title: Deploy and Monitor the Platform
description: Deploy the platform to a staging environment for initial testing before moving to production. Monitor its performance for any issues, collaborate with the DevOps engineer and QA Tester teams to resolve them. Ensure that the deployment process is well-documented for future reference.
